narrative.narrative: Avialeasing Aviation Company is a cargo airline based at Tashkent,Uzbekistan. It was the first private airline in the country. It began in 1992 It is a joint USA-Uzbekistan effort and opened up a company called the SRX Group in the Miami,Florida area in 1993. Its fleet at 2012 included at least one Il-76TD and at least one An-26. It also owns 2 An-12's which are leased to SRX Group and are painted in SRX livery. Avialeasing focuses on Asia and Europe destinations. There is a picture of an SRX plane in Cambridge Bay,Canada which is in arctic Canada so it serves the North America and Caribbean area. SRX Transcontinental owns 61% of the airline and Igor Smirnov 39%. Its regular routes from Tashkent in 2005 were to Almaty,Kazakhstan Bishkek,Kyrgyzstan and Kabul,Afghanistan.
